about_the_game:
Elysian Eclipse is a Sandbox Evolution Simulator, aiming to be a spiritual successor to Spore, letting you evolve from an amoeba into a space traveling sentient being. Turn the galaxy into your personal playground!

Gameplay

The game will be divided into multiple stages of evolution, each with different gameplay mechanics. You will begin your journey controlling a single organism, but eventually move on to manage cities or even entire planets.

There are currently a total of seven stages planned: Cell, Aquatic, Creature, Tribal, Medieval, Industrial and finally the Space Stage. We want each stage to have its own unique systems and multiple hours of gameplay. To achieve this goal we want to work tightly together with the community to keep expanding the game with creative ideas.

The Elysian Archive

Elysian Eclipse offers a huge variety of editors to create content inside the game. This includes creatures, buildings and vehicles. You can assemble everything through simple drag-and-drop mechanics and further configure every single part through an inspector, making it possible to change details like size, rotation, color or texture.

All your creations will be collected inside a gallery called the "Elysian Archive". It starts out with a collection of premade content and can easily be expanded by exporting your creations as "cards" and exchanging them with other players.

Disclaimer

This project is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected to Spore, EA, or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional disk space required to store player-made creations.
